long_description: Throw the Horny Toad Lyra Dress into your suitcase for your next summer trip. Pack along some flip-flops for daytime and heels for night and you're covered for whatever fun comes your way. Organic cotton/modal/spandex blend is lightweight, soft and has a hint of stretch. Pleat-accented scoop neck and empire band are finished with a raw-edge trim. Stash pocket inside hem. An A-line silhouette and broad bra-friendly straps make the Horny Toad Lyra Dress flattering and comfortable.
short_description: Throw the Horny Toad Lyra Dress into your suitcase for your next summer trip. Pack along some flip-flops for daytime and heels for night and you're covered for whatever fun comes your way.
